title: README Enhancement
description: Proposal to enhance the verbosity, detail, and utility of the project's README.md file. This includes expanding sections on architecture, usage, and governance protocols to provide better guidance for both Directors and Engineers.
author: Engineer

dialogue.note: Revised README to be a verbose technical manual for both human and ZK entities. Added sections for Integrity Model (3-Way Audit), Transactional Workspace (Shadow/Patches), Error States/Remediation, and a Warden-Aware Agent Specification. Confirmed use of markdown codeblocks for commands and output.
